title: DPM arrives in Kabul for signing trilateral agreement on UAP Railway Project feasibility study
content:
KABUL, Jul 17 (APP):Deputy Prime Minister/Foreign Minister (DPM/FM), Senator Mohammad Ishaq Dar on Thursday arrived in Kabul, Afghanistan, for the signing of the trilateral Framework Agreement on Joint Feasibility Study for the
Uzbekistan-Afghanistan-Pakistan (UAP) Railway Project.
He is accompanied by Minister for Railways, Special Representative for Afghanistan, & Secretary Railways, a
Ministry of Foreign Affairs news release said.
